2902_9006_000008_000000|2902|{AH0 P IH1 K CH ER0 AH1 V L AY1 F IH1 N DH AH0 F IH1 TH S EH1 N CH ER0 IY0 M AH1 S T N IY1 D Z K AH0 N T EY1 N M AH1 CH W IH1 CH W AH0 L B IY0 P EY1 N F AH0 L T UW1 EH1 N IY0 R IY1 D ER0 sp AE1 N D W IH1 CH DH IY0 Y AH1 NG AH0 N D IH1 N AH0 S AH0 N T W AH0 L D UW1 W EH1 L T AH0 L IY1 V AO2 L T AH0 G EH1 DH ER0 AH0 N R EH1 D}|A picture of life in the fifth century must needs contain much which will be painful to any reader, and which the young and innocent will do well to leave altogether unread.
2902_9006_000008_000003|2902|{HH IY1 D EH1 R N AA1 T T EH1 L HH AW1 IY1 V AH0 L P IY1 P AH0 L W ER1 sp HH IY1 W AH0 L N AA1 T B IY1 B IH0 L IY1 V D IH1 F HH IY1 T EH1 L Z HH AW1 G UH1 D DH EY1 W ER1}|He dare not tell how evil people were; he will not be believed if he tells how good they were.

The cape itself is nothing but a huge mount of granite standing naked and alone to meet the Atlantic waves.
6241_61943_000018_000003|6241|{AE1 F T ER0 S AH1 M AW1 R Z W IY1 K EY1 M IH0 N S AY1 T AH0 V AH0 S AA1 L AH0 T EH2 R IY0 R AA1 K IH0 N DH IY0 OW1 SH AH0 N sp F AO1 R M IH0 NG AH0 M AY1 T IY0 V AO1 L T sp TH R UW1 W IH1 CH DH AH0 F OW1 M IH0 NG W EY1 V Z P AO1 R D W IH0 TH IH0 N T EH1 N S F Y UH1 R IY0}|After some hours we came in sight of a solitary rock in the ocean, forming a mighty vault, through which the foaming waves poured with intense fury.

6241_61946_000016_000000|6241|{G UH1 D B IY1 S T sp G UH1 D B IY1 S T HH IY1 W UH1 D K R AY1}|"Good beast, good beast," he would cry.
